import React, {Component} from 'react'; class MovieApp extends Component { state = { currentid: 0, searchTerm: "", addTitle: "", addYear: 0, addPoster: "", addDescription: "", currentMovie: null, movieList: [ //{id: 0, title: "Interstellar", year: 2014, poster:'https://i.ytimg.com/vi/YF1eYbfbH5k/maxresdefault.jpg', description: "Man goes to space to save the world."}, //{id: 1, title: "Dune", year: 2021, poster:'https://assets-prd.ignimgs.com/2021/08/09/dune-button-2021-1628542173776.jpg', description: "Paul Atreites arrives on Arrakis for a big surprise"}, ], }; getMovies() { if(this.state.movieList.length < 0){ return(
No movies found
); } else{ return(
Found movies
); } } render() { return (
Search Movie:
Add Movie:



Movies:
{this.getMovies()}

Title

picture

description

); } } export default MovieApp;
